naslov: Zagreb - Gornje Vrapče - kuća s pogledom (500 m2 stambene površine) (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Prodaje se velika obiteljska kuća s prekrasnim panoramskim pogledom na grad Zagreb! Kuća je smještena u Gornjem Vrapču, na nadomorskoj visini od cca 250m, orijentirana prema jugoistoku. U blizini kuće su dvije autobusne linije, a u radijusu od 1200m nalaze se osnovna škola, dječji vrtić, tržnica, trgovina, dom zdravlja i ljekarna. Kuća je smještena na parceli od cca 1900m2. Ima dva kolna prilaza pri čemu jedan omogućava prilaz kamenom popločenom parkiralištu za dva automobila dok drugi omogućava prilaz garaži popločenom rampom koja je punjena glikolom kako ne bi došlo do smrzavanja zimi. Sa bočne strane kuće, nalazi se staza sa stepenicama koje vode u drugi dio dvorišta (ispod kuće) na kojem se nalazi vrt površine cca 120m2 koji ima sustav navodnjavanja, a na njemu se nalaze i kaskadne gredice za povrće, voćnjak, pečenjara i četverodjelni montažni objekt. Kuća je troslojno armirana pri čemu je debljina zidova oko 43cm bez žbuke s krovištem od kvalitetne drvene građe koja je impregnirana te crijepom njemačkog proizvođača oznake G10. Vanjska stolarija je od kuhanog smrekovog drveta, stakla su troslojna s komora punjenim inertnim plinom. Svi prozori imaju aluminijske rolete, pri čemu se prozori na vanjskoj fasadi pokreću pomoću elektromotora i automatski reagiraju na padaline i jaki vjetar. Kuća ima i video nadzor te alarmni sustav na baterijsko napajanje s detektorom loma stakla i pokreta. Također, u kući je instaliran i centralni sustav usisavanja kao i kanal za odlaganje prljavog rublja koji završava u suterenu. Kuća je klimatizirana s osam unutarnjih i tri vanjske jedinice. Unutaranja stolarija (parketi i stepenište) su hrastovi. Kuća se sastoji od triju etaža: Podrum - radionica (36,69 m2) i sanitarni čvor. Suteren - vanjska terasa (56,32m2), lovačka soba (48,67m2), lovačka kuhinja (14,58m2), praona rublja, kotlovnica, vinoteka (13,24m2), fitness i whirpool, nekoliko prostora za odlaganje, garaža s natkrivenim prostorom ispred (38,13 m2), sanitarni čvor Prizemlje - veliki dnevni boravak (60,59 m2), kuhinja, radna soba (16,89 m2), natkrivena terasa (20,91m2), trijem, ulazni hodnik koji vodi u mali dnevni boravak (20,77 m2) i dvije manje spavaće sobe (10,20m2), kupaonica i sanitarni čvor Kat - roditeljska soba koja se sastoji od spavaće sobe, kupaone i garderobe (40m2), dječja soba (16,72m2), soba za goste (20,84m2), natrkivena terasa (25,26m2), dodatna kupaona, priručno spremište te dva tavana s izvedenim priključcima za sve instalacije (jedan površine 53,36m2 i drugi površine 135,42m2) Cijena nije fiksna! AGENT: Mario 099 365 3788 ili mario@zagreb4u.com AGENCIJSKA PROVIZIJA OD KUPCA: 2% + PDV ******************************************** Large family house with a beautiful panoramic view of the city of Zagreb for sale! The house is located in Gornje Vrapče at a suromor height of about 250m, oriented towards the southeast. There are two bus lines near the house, and within a radius of 1200m there is a primary school, kindergarten, market, shop, health center and pharmacy. The house is located on a plot of approximately 1900m2. It has two driveways, with one providing access to a stone-paved parking lot for two cars, while the other allows access to a garage paved with glycol-filled ramps to avoid freezing in winter. On the side of the house, there is a path with stairs leading to another part of the yard (under the house) on which there is a garden of approx. 120m2 that has an irrigation system, and there are cascading flower beds for vegetables, an orchard, a roastery and a four-piece prefabricated object. The house is three-layer reinforced with a wall thickness of about 43cm without plaster with a roof of quality timber impregnated and tile from the German manufacturer of the G10 designation. The exterior joinery is made of boiled spruce wood, the glass is three-layer with chambers filled with inert gas. All windows have aluminum blinds, whereby the windows on the outer façade are started using electric motors and automatically react to precipitation and strong wind. The house also has video surveillance and a battery-powered alarm system with a glass and motion breakage detector. Also, a central suction system is installed in the house, as well as a channel for storing dirty laundry that ends in a basement. The house is air-conditioned with eight indoor and three outdoor units. Inside the joinery (parquet floors and staircase) are oaks. The house consists of three floors: Basement - workshop (36.69 m2) and sanitary facilities. Basement 2 - outdoor terrace (56.32m2), hunting room (48.67m2), hunting kitchen (14.58m2), laundry, boiler room, wine shop (13.24m2), fitness and whirlpool, several storage areas, garage with covered area in front (38.13 m2), toilet Ground floor - large living room (60.59 m2), kitchen, study (16.89 m2), covered terrace (20.91m2), porch, entrance hall leading to a small living room (20.77 m2) and two smaller bedrooms (10.20m2), bathroom and toilet First floor - parents' room consisting of bedroom, bathroom and wardrobe (40m2), children's room (16.72m2), guest room (20.84m2), crammed terrace (25.26m2), additional bathroom, handy storage and two attics with made connections for all installations (one area of 53.36m2 and another area of 135.42m2) The price is not fixed! AGENT: Mario 099 365 3788 or mario@zagreb4u.com AGENCY COMMISSION FROM THE CUSTOMER: 2% + VAT
